text: "The Passenger" is a 1977 song by Iggy Pop and taken from his second studio album Lust for Life. It has appeared in many movies, tv shows, documentaries and video games. ==Siouxsie and the Banshees version== British gothic rock band covered "The Passenger" in 1987. It was taken from their eighth studio covers album Through the Looking Glass. That version went to number 41 in the United Kingdom. title: The Passenger (song)
